questions.name: Two Sum
questions.description: Given an array of integers nums and an integer target, return indices of the two numbers such that they add up to target. You may assume that each input would have exactly one solution, and you may not use the same element twice.

questions.name: Longest Substring Without Repeating Characters
questions.description: Given a string s, find the length of the longest substring without repeating characters.

questions.name: Build a Hash Map
questions.description: Design and implement a hash map from scratch. The hash map should support put, get, and remove operations. Assume that the keys are integers and the values are strings.

questions.name: Build a Linked List
questions.description: Implement a singly linked list with operations to insert, delete, and traverse. Each node in the linked list contains an integer value and a reference to the next node.

questions.name: Build a Stack
questions.description: Design and implement a stack with push, pop, and peek operations using an array.
